item.content:encoded:
Customizable Design

Made Entirely By Hand From 100% Natural Wool

shop now

Inspired By Nature

Design from nature-inspired details

Craft Weaving

Entirely by hand - completely manual

100% Wool Sheep

Made by 100% natural wool sheep

New Arrivals

  • Woollen Handmade – Scales

Featured
Collections

All Beni rugs are made to order - entirely by hand - from 100% natural wool, which means there will be natural (and beautiful) variations in pattern and color.

shop collection

The Desert

Shape Pattern

The Minimal

Welcome to the Jungle. A collection of rugs inspired by the gardens of Morocco.

  • Woollen Handmade – Scales

    $355.00 Add to cart Add to wishlist Quick view

  • Woollen Handmade – Steps

    $325.00 Add to cart Add to wishlist Quick view

  • Woollen Handmade – Up

    $345.00 Add to cart Add to wishlist Quick view

Anon WoolSheep

All Beni rugs are made to order - entirely by hand - from 100% natural wool, which means there will be natural (and beautiful) variations in pattern and color. These variations make each rug truly one-of-a-kind. As they say in Morocco, it's the "charm of the hand."

our history
